metadata.file_basename: Allow Me to Introduce Tonights Players
metadata.item_name: Allow Me to Introduce Tonight's Players

effects.effect: Whenever you take the first turn in a combat encounter, you can use a main action to introduce yourself and your allies to your opponents. Each ally can shift up to their speed, and ability rolls made against them have a double bane until the end of the combat round. Additionally, any surprised enemy is no longer surprised.
